name: Bunny Go Boom!
description:
Poor Easter Bunny lost his eggs in a mine field and you must help him find them.

Arrow keys to move bunny.
Return to your hole when you have all eggs for next level.
Collect all eggs without hitting the mines or boom!

You will be shown the mines for 5 seconds before you can move and then for 2 seconds when you collect an egg so make a visual map to try and get all the eggs and get back to your hole.
